etymology.description: 酒(酒) (jiǔ, "alcohol; wine") + 单(單) (dān, "list") = drinks menu
etymology.interpretation: A 酒單(酒單) (jiǔdān, "drinks menu") is a list of alcoholic beverages available at a restaurant or bar. 酒(酒) (jiǔ, "alcohol") signifies the focus on alcoholic drinks, while 单(單) (dān, "list") indicates that it is an itemized collection.

examples.chinese: 请给我看看酒单(請給我看看酒單)。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ kànkan jiǔ dān.
examples.english: Please show me the drinks menu.

examples.chinese: 酒单上有啤酒和葡萄酒(酒單上有啤酒和葡萄酒)。
examples.pinyin: Jiǔ dān shàng yǒu píjiǔ hé pútáojiǔ.
examples.english: The drinks menu includes beer and wine.

examples.chinese: 我们根据酒单点了饮料(我們根據酒單點了飲料)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen gēnjù jiǔ dān diǎnle yǐnliào.
examples.english: We ordered drinks according to the drinks menu.
